com.ibm.mce.sdk.api.broadcast

Interface EventBroadcastHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MceBroadcastReceiver

    public interface EventBroadcastHandler
    This interface is for classes that handle MCE events

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COPYRIGHT

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAttributesOperation(Context context, AttributesOperation attributesOperation)
      This method is called when an attributes operation is executed.

      This method is called when a delivery channel error occurs
      void onDeliveryChannelRegistered(Context context)
      This method is called when the device delivery channel is registered.

      This method is called when events are sent to the server
      void onIllegalNotification(Context context, Intent intent)
      This method is called if a notification was received that is not a legal mce notification

      This method is called when a new notification is received.

      This method is called if the intent does not contain an mce event

      • onSdkRegistered

        void onSdkRegistered(Context context)
        This method is called when the SDK is registered.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.

      • onDeliveryChannelRegistered

        This method is called when the device delivery channel is registered.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context

      • onSdkRegistrationChanged

        void onSdkRegistrationChanged(Context context)
        This method is called when the device delivery channel is registered.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(Context context,
             NotificationDetails notificationDetails,
             Bundle msgExtras)
        This method is called when a new notification is received.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        notificationDetails - The received notification's details.
        msgExtras - Any other payload that arrived with the notification.

      • onC2dmError

        void onC2dmError(Context context,
               java.lang.String errorId)
        This method is called when a delivery channel error occurs
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        errorId - The id of the error

      • onSessionStart

        void onSessionStart(Context context,
                  java.util.Date sessionStartDate)
        This method is called when a new session is started
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        sessionStartDate - The session's start timestamp

      • onSessionEnd

        void onSessionEnd(Context context,
                java.util.Date sessionEndDate,
                long sessionDurationInMinutes)
        This method is called when a session ends
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        sessionEndDate - The session's end timestamp
        sessionDurationInMinutes - The session duration in minutes (rounded from milliseconds).

      • onNotificationAction

        void onNotificationAction(Context context,
                        java.util.Date actionTime,
                        java.lang.String pushType,
                        java.lang.String actionType,
                        java.lang.String actionValue)
        This method is called when a notification notification is clicked
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        actionTime - The time of the click
        pushType - The type of the push notification (simple / rich)
        actionType - The type of the notification
        actionValue - The value of the notification

      • onAttributesOperation

        void onAttributesOperation(Context context,
                         AttributesOperation attributesOperation)
        This method is called when an attributes operation is executed.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        attributesOperation - The executed operation

      • onEventsSend

        void onEventsSend(Context context,
                java.util.List<Event> events)
        This method is called when events are sent to the server
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        events - The events that were sent

      • onNonMceBroadcast

        void onNonMceBroadcast(Context context,
                     Intent intent)
        This method is called if the intent does not contain an mce event
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        intent - The received intent

      • onIllegalNotification

        void onIllegalNotification(Context context,
                         Intent intent)
        This method is called if a notification was received that is not a legal mce notification
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        intent - The received notification intent
